original_text: And he received them at their hand, and fashioned it with a graving tool, after he had made it a molten calf: and they said, These be thy gods, O Israel, which brought thee up out of the land of Egypt.
korean_text: 아론이 그들의 손에서 금 고리를 받아 부어서 조각칼로 새겨 송아지 형상을 만드니 그들이 말하되 이스라엘아 이는 너희를 애굽 땅에서 인도하여 낸 너희의 신이로다 하는지라

sentences.original_text: And he received them at their hand
and fashioned it with a graving tool
after he had made it a molten calf
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그것을 녹인 송아지로 만든 후에

sentences.original_text: These be thy gods, O Israel
which brought thee up out of the land of Egypt
